interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Busy Co. Biodegradable Hydrating Hand Wipes, With Collagen and Peptides to Smooth and Improve Elasticity, 15 Individually Wrapped Wipes (Refresh Line - Fresh Citrus)
Review Date: 2020/11/02
Store: BUSYCO
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BUSYCO', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4.5 x 7.3 x 3.5 inches; 4.16 Ounces'}
Review Text: These wipes are earth friendly, made in the U.S., sanitize, AND moisturize....could a hand wipe be any more perfect?  The wipes are a nice thickness that remains moist even after several passes...I was literally able to clean my hands and arms after the gym.  The packets are small and easy to toss in my gym bag or purse, the wipes have no scent, and one will go a long way.  And most impressive, aside from the company’s commitment to sustainability, my skin dries quickly, isn’t sticky, and feels quite soft.  The air just got dry where I live, so every bit of moisture is appreciated.  Love this company, love this product!
Review Title: Earth friendly wipes, clean and soft hands!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
6 Pack 3D Mask Bracket Internal Support Frame, Vamotto No Smell Nasal Mask Pad for Adult and Children to Creating More Space for Breathing and Protection Lipstick Ideal Makeup Saver
Vamotto
{'Product Dimensions': '4 x 3.2 x 2 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '739210749279'}
I had heard about these mask frames and was so excited to see them available on Amazon.  I was hoping they’d help keep my mask drier while at the gym.  Unfortunately, they’re simply too small for an adult face...I’m not even sure they’d work for a child.  The frame is surprisingly comfortable against the face, and it did indeed create a pocket/bubble around my nose and mouth.  However, the frames are so small, I literally can’t open my mouth to talk without my lower lip slipping uncomfortably out of the frame...and I have a pretty average sized face!  If you don’t talk to anyone while wearing a mask, this is a cool little find.  If you do talk, or just breathe heavily (like at the gym), this will never, ever work for you...not even close.  I did try cutting off the bottom of the frame, where it rests on the chin.  This helped, but the edges of the frame end up pushing into my face, which I’m guessing would be uncomfortable after a few minutes, and would definitely leave marks.  Oh well, I tried!
Great idea, but...no.
Karuna Oh, Glow On Face Mask Sheet, Skincare and Beauty Facial Masks with Moisturizing and Collagen Promotion Properties for Healthy Glow, Contain Green Tea, Vitamin C and Pineapple (3 Sheets)
Karuna
{'Brand': 'Karuna', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrate Skin,Hydrate', 'Scent': 'Pineapple', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Package Dimensions': '6.54 x 4.88 x 0.87 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MSF1004 - CA', 'UPC': '857950007166'}
I’ve used various Karuna masks, but this is defiantly my favorite.  The mask was super saturated out of the package, so I had to scrape some of the serum off to keep it from dripping.  I also had to fold the large mask over in a few spots where it covered my hairline on all 3 sides.  On my face the mask was cool and refreshing.  Conveniently, it didn’t slip at all, even while sitting up and looking at my cell phone.  I could smell the green tea, but it wasn’t overwhelming.  TIP:  I’ve learned that Karuna masks leave A LOT of serum on the face that doesn’t easily absorb into the skin once the mask is removed.  I left the mask on for 30 minutes, increasing absorption and letting it dry out a bit...I highly recommend this, followed by splashing cool water on your face to gently remove any excess serum.  This prevents sticky skin and left my face feeling smooth and soft almost immediately.  Within 2 hours my skin felt hydrated and looked brighter and super clean.  Very happy with this mask!
My favorite Karuna mask!
Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz
Zeitun
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'}
This coffee scrub smells divine while dry, and leaves my skin smelling ever so subtly like coffee and cinnamon.  Oddly, I don’t really notice the smell in the shower.  I love the exfoliation and use it on my entire body.  Out of the shower, I feel a mild oil barrier on my skin that I don’t care for.  Once I add my normal body shaping cream (Clarins Body Fit), I’m in heaven!  The 2 products together leave my skin super cool and tingly for about an hour, followed by crazy soft skin.  I don’t actually have a lot of cellulite (thank you Clarins!), but what I do have is less noticeable after just 2 uses.  So, what’s not to like?  This scrub is so incredibly messy, it’s borderline impractical!  Most scrubs are made with sugar or salt crystals held together with some form of oil or gel, and dissolve in the shower.  Ground coffee doesn’t dissolve and this scrub is dry, so it literally gets everywhere...like sand from the beach!  And worse, I have a walk in shower with white tile floors...coffee stains if it sits too long!  As much as I like the way this product smells and improves my skin texture, it’s a pain in my cellulite free backside to clean up!  Mixing it with a little water and creating a paste before use helps a little, and thankfully I have a handheld shower to quickly rinse it off my tiled walls and shower door, but I’m constantly concerned it’s going to stain my floor grout.  Deep sigh...I soooooo wish this product weren’t so messy!
Super soft skin, but oh so messy to use!!
Busy Co. Biodegradable Hydrating Hand Wipes, With Collagen and Peptides to Smooth and Improve Elasticity, 15 Individually Wrapped Wipes (Refresh Line - Fresh Citrus)
BUSYCO

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Health and Fitness Focused:** The user remains committed to health and fitness, seeking products that enhance their active lifestyle and contribute to overall well-being.
- **Prioritizes Comfort and Functionality:** They emphasize comfort and practicality in products used during workouts, specifically those that accommodate heavy breathing and talking.
- **Detailed Product Feedback:** The user provides thorough feedback based on their experiences, favoring reliability and user-friendly designs. Their evaluations reflect a discerning perspective on product usability.
- **Sensitivity to Fit and Comfort Issues:** The user exhibits a keen awareness of fit and comfort, articulating frustration with sizing and prolonged wear, which affects skin sensitivity.
- **Skincare Enthusiast:** They enjoy exploring skincare solutions, sharing practical tips from personal experience and remaining interested in products delivering tangible results.
- **Resourceful Modifications:** They are open to modifying products for enhanced usability, showcasing a proactive approach in finding functional solutions.
- **Attention to Practicality:** Recent insights highlight a concern about the practicality of skincare products, particularly regarding messiness and ease of cleanup, without sacrificing skin benefits.
- **Emphasis on Eco-Friendly Options:** The user shows a strong preference for environmentally friendly products, appreciating features that align with sustainability while effectively addressing their skincare needs. They value items that are portable, versatile, and effective in their daily routines.

Overall, the user maintains a strong focus on comfort, fit, practicality, and sustainability in health-related products, with an increasing emphasis on ease of use within their skincare regimen.
